channel.title: My first model
channel.description:
Just need to figure out how to fit it to the RS Guy :| This is my first ever model! I made one practice one to get use to the controls but it wasn't a sword so :p [img]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/9439/myfirstmodel.png[/img]
[img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/4316/myfirstmodel4.png[/img]
[img]http://img102.imageshack.us/img102/7853/myfirstmodel2.png[/img]
[img]http://img150.imageshack.us/img150/378/myfirstmodel3.png[/img]
[img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/245/render2q.png[/img]
[img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/2809/render1h.png[/img]
[img]http://www.piratemerch.com/images/french_flintlock_dagger_pistol.jpg[/img] Base, I kinda made it easier...

item.title: My first model
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

the very bottem of the hilt, the tip, change it to black or w.e colour that is, and finish colouring the rest of your hilt, i can see the bottem of the hilt is still black.

also, looks pretty clean as cj said for a first, try adding textures to ur matting so you can make a decent blade texture so it doesn’t look as dull or bland i guess.

for the handle itself try making the grips i guess, idk what you’d call em, but the lines that circle the handle [=|=|=|=|=]
very bad example lol “|” slits
xD

Read full topic

item.title: My first model
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Looks nice and clean for a first model, could i view more angles of it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 19-07-2009, 15:49:50[/size][hr]Ok, thanks, it looks good, the overall geometry is fine, could be a tiny bit smoother, but it’ll do, i would say, add some detail to it? Gems etc.
Good job.

Read full topic
